About.Name: Anthony Mao
About.AboutText:
Hi, I am Anthony Mao. I am a computer science student pursuing my undergraduate degree at Seattle Pacific University, expected graduation June 2026.

I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute my expertise and learn from my peers.

Beyond the classroom, I am dedicated to continuous learning and exploring new technologies to expand my expertise.

Outside of school, I enjoy playing piano and listening to classical music, as well as going for walks in new places.

Experience.ExperienceText: I am familiar with a bit of C++ and Python.
Experience.EducationText: Currently pursuing my undergraduate degree in Computer Science at Seattle Pacific University, with coursework focused on software engineering, algorithms, and database systems.
Experience.EmploymentText:
Provided technical support for classroom technology, digitized documents, and assisted with IT systems setup. Over the summer of 2025, I completed an internship at Prestige Stem Academy, a private educational institution specializing in college counseling.

Role: IT Support Intern
  • Set up classroom technology (TVs, computers, printers, quiz buzzers)
  • Scanned and digitized class documents
  • Managed student attendance and performance via registration system
  • Supported Canvas and school account setup under IT supervision

Project1.Title: TrayMate Senior Software Engineering Project
Project1.Desc:
TrayMate is a smart, AI-powered meal management system designed for care facilities. It automates meal suggestions and provides a simple ordering interface for residents, particularly those with special dietary needs.

Team Project: Collaborated with classmates.
My Role: Timekeeper, responsible for ensuring everything is submitted on time.

Project2.Title: Github Portfolio Project
Project2.Desc:
I learned to create a simple portfolio using Github.

Individual Project: Spent time studying basic html and css.
